name: Marines (Globe&Anchor) Pointer {The Pacific}
description:
replaces the normal colored arrow, pointing to the corresponding pages you click on; dashboard, tumblelog, messages, help etc, to a Marines insignia (tested on chrome and firefox, but if there's any problems, you can message me here)

base code credit to: http://userstyles.org/styles/49928/tumblr-extras-heart-selector
